com.epam.training.command.factory

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.command.factory.CommandFactory

  • public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class CommandFactory returns a proper ICommand class depending on the value of "action" request parameter. The factory is constructed using Singleton design pattern (allows to create only 1 instance of factory).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev
    See Also:
    ICommand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICommand getCommand(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns a proper ICommand class depending on the value of "action" request parameter.
      static CommandFactory getInstance()
      Returns the only instance of CommandFactory

        Returns the only instance of CommandFactory

      • getCommand

        public ICommand getCommand(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns a proper ICommand class depending on the value of "action" request parameter.
        Parameters:
